column1: Smoque BBQ////I'd say that Smoque--because of its somewhat obscure location--is a little-known Chicago gem
column2: except that the long lines prove me otherwise.  This place is worth going out of your way for.  I love the ribs
column5: but I've never had a meal I didn't like here.   A year ago
column6: my husband initiated a BBQ comparison
column7: in which we ate meals from Smoque and the more trendily located Fat Willy's side by side.  For both its rub and its sauces
column8: Smoque won by a landslide.  Keep up the great work!
